Sending reports over HTTPS exposes the a:
Sending reports over HTTPS exposes the act of doing so, but not the content.

Also, hiding the fact that you are submitting something makes the report anonymous, which is strongly recommended.

This can be achieved with the use of the Tor Browser, providing anonymisation not found in other browsers.

By using the Tor network and creating an: By using the Tor network and creating an Onion Service, Ricochet is an instant messaging app that allows you to chat while protecting your privacy and staying anonymous by not revealing your location or IP address. You won't notice any difference from an insecure chat, except that you will be using a unique address instead of a phone number/email/username.

This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their report.
You are asked to pay special attention t: You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this report should be considered to be of high importance.
